title: Runes and Masteries for Nocturne
body:
Guys I've been trying to find a perfect Rune page and masteries for Nocturne.

I don't really know if any of youse know any good Rune pages and masteries that could help me.

replies.body:
Depends on your playstyle, for example if you like ulting a lot, consider flat or scaling CDR blues (or even quintessences).
AD and AS are very good stats. Armour/hp according to preference.

21/9/0

AD Quints
AS Marks
Armour/Health Seals
MR Per Lvl Glyphs
Thanks Guys you are the best! =D

21/9/0

AD Marks
Armor Seals
MR Per lvl Glyphs
AS Quints

go 21/9/0 or 21/0/9 if ur gosu. u need attack speed for marks. CDR or MR  + 4 or 3 attack speed for glyph. get armor for yellow one. and mix movement speed and attack speed for quintess rune.  For AA based jglers, having as many attack speed rune is preferred.
